Hi there!

I’m Chad You, Sr Database Administrator at VUMC Health Policy, where I lead the Data Core team.

Professionaly, I love teaching healthcare analytics, researching digital health, and developing data solutions.

If you’d like to learn more about what I do, check out one of my projects:

  • Healthcare Analytics Handbook, is the place to start if you want to learn data analytics in healthcare.

  • Today I Learned, where I share something new I learned every day.

If you’ve found my blogs helpful and want to buy me a coffee or tea, feel free to contribute over at ko-fi.com/chadyou.

Outside of work, I love to practice Aikido at Nashville Aikikai.
